title: Birdcage, 1735–96
medium: Ivory, ebony, jade, cloisonne, amber, porcelain
dimensions:
H x diam. (a): 56.5 x 33 cm (22 1/4 x 13 in.)
H x diam. (b): 6.5 x 33 cm (2 9/16 x 13 in.)
description:
Hanging type, circular dome shape with tall finial, silver hanger.
Components:
1 cage
1 beaded ring
4 water bowls
1 cylindrical feeder
1 mini birdcage
1 coral feeder
2 hanging rings
2 perches
1 ivory ornament with metal bugs
2 jade clips
3 ivory clips
1 ivory stick

tombstone.epitaph:
Birdcage, 1735–96.
1735–96. Ivory, ebony, jade, cloisonne, amber, porcelain. Gift of Thomas F. Ryan. 1916-26-1-a/t.
